reviewText:
This is a wonderful product, Loretta Laroche does a fantastic job of looking at our stress and helping us to laugh about it, which helps to relieve the stress.
Comedy stress class in a DVD format.

After reviewing amazon customer reviews, I bought this set because on a vacation, we happened to have seen Loretta Laroche on a TV show on a cruise.  It was the "Joy of Stress" presentation, which happens to be in this collection and is her best work. Of the three DVDs in this set, Joy of Stress is the best.  The other two I'd give 3 stars, and Joy of Stress I'd give five, hence the rating average I gave. I won't be buying the other ones after reading customer reviews and owning this set.
